revised_title: Advancements in Measuring Rapid Reaction Velocities using Photoelectric Methods
tldr: The author developed a portable micro-apparatus that can measure the velocity of rapid reactions using photoelectric methods. This apparatus can be used for various color-changing reactions, even with small quantities of material, and is suitable for studying biological substances. The author demonstrated its effectiveness in measuring reactions with half-reaction times greater than 0.0005 seconds.
